title: What is up with Shaco mains???
body: I really don't understand how these people sleep at night. Everyone on the other team hates them as well as everyone on their own team. Not to mention that I've never met a single Shaco player that is nice and friendly, because they are all toxic and rude. But im also only silver 3 so maybe you shaco players are nicer in higher elo. If you have anything to add on to what am saying or think something i said is wrong please tell me.

replies.body:
Any champion with a high "outplay" potential combined with a total lack of skill requirement (zed, yasuo, riven, shaco, katarina [not as much anymore]) is favored by the sort of obnoxious tryhard garbage that loves constantly barfing out shit about how great they are and pushing everyone else down.
It has to do with A; massive insecurity and B; they are just worthless little brats.

The mistaken idea that high skill-_ceiling_ champions automatically have high skill-floors or entry requirements is mostly at fault.

>Any champion with a high "outplay" potential combined with a total lack of skill requirement (zed, yasuo, riven, shaco, katarina [not as much anymore])

t. ahri player 

you are projecting very hard

I dont think i have ever seen an ahri put their mastery emote on a looping macro and spam /all every time they get a kill or die.
You dont _have_ to be brat trash to play edgy high-skill champiomns, but it helps.

I did see a mature and polite riven once, actually. It was pretty recently, i think season 5.
